post:
Hello all,

We are glad to announce our special promotion exclusive to the community.

**LEB Exclusive - Against COVID-19 4GB KVM Offer**
- 4 vCPU 
- 4096 RAM
- 60GB RAID10 Disk Space
- 2TB @ 1Gbit/s Uplink
- 1x IPv4 (Additional on request anytime!)
- KVM/SolusVM
- $7/mo
- No Coupon Code Required

Order Now: https://portal.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=123

**Available OS Templates**
- CentOS 6/7/8
- Debian 8/9/10
- Ubuntu 16.04/18.04
- Fedora 20/23/30
- LinuxMint 17.2
- SolusOS 1.2
- OpenSuse 42.1
- Scientific Linux 7.0

_Custom ISO can be attached on request,Windows is possible if you bring your own license._

**Network Information**
Los Angeles, CA
Test IPv4: 107.175.180.6

Dallas, TX
Test IPv4: 161.129.152.2

Hillsboro, OR
Test IPv4: 147.135.37.183

**Accepted Payment Method**
- Credit Cards (Stripe)
- Alipay 
- WeChat Pay
- PaymentWall
- Wire/Bank/ACH transfer

**About Us**
[TheStack ](https://thestak.net)has been providing high-quality web hosting services since 2015. We've served thousands of happy customers throughout the world so far, and we are constantly improving our services to get close to our mission: being reliable but affordable. 

We utilize Dual Intel E5 CPUs and RAID 10 arrays on all of our VPS nodes, and we never oversell. We've setup proactive monitoring for all of our nodes, should you have any server or network issues, you can reach out to our in-house support team anytime via helpdesk, email or live chat.

We've developed a new modern website in English and Simplified Chinese. We are interested in providing sponsorship to open-source projects and COVID-19 related projects, if you are looking for sponsorship, feel free to contact us.

**Have any questions?**
Chat with us at https://thestack.net | Email us at sales@thestack.net
